1370: Wellinus moved to Lange gracht.C.3 after marriage.
Got married to Gertrudis at age 26 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Scilla, at age 28.
1375: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Brundonis, at age 31.
1376: Had a son with Gertrudis, Gherbaren, at age 32.
1379: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Ghodelde, at age 35.
1381: Had a son with Gertrudis, Blomart, at age 37.
Lost son Gherbaren when Gherbaren was 6 years old.
1386: Lost son Nannekin when Nannekin was 0 years old.
Gertrudis gave birth to their stillborn son Nannekin in 1386.
1388: Had a son with Gertrudis, Blankard, at age 44.
Lost son Blankard when Blankard was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1389: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Ymmekine, at age 45.
